knimeNode.name: Image Importer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Imports referenced images to the KNIME-internal representation basically to process them in further steps.

fullDescription.intro: Imports referenced images to KNIME basically to process them in further steps. It copies them from various sources and converts them to the KNIME-internal representation.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The selection of the column which contains the image references.

Select the image planes here you actually want to import. Use shift or ctrl-keys to mark more than one plane or the "all"-checkbox to select all available planes. Detailed informations about the sizes of the individual dimensions can be obtained from the core metadata list above in the file chooser. The possible dimension of an image apart from the image width (X) and height (Y) are Z (for 3D-information), C (channels, mostly represented by different colors) and T (the time points e.g. of a video).
